resources.string: About\n This app provides the daily buddhist prayers (ཁ་ཐུན) common in Bhutan.

Problem viewing the content?\n If you are not able to view the contents, most probably the dzongkha fonts are not installed on your phone. Please follow the instructions provided on the Dzongkha Development Commission

Content Credits
 The prayers provided by this app are used directly from the following sites:


1. Lotsawa House
 2. iTibet
Feedback\n If you have any feedback or want to contribute, kindly let me know at kxt5258 [@] gmail [dot] com:\n
